root.title: boe ba sai order worth on billion dlr
root.body: boe co sai order 15 extend rang 767 300 amr corp amr worth on billion dlr compani sai amr first custom 767 300er twinjet deriv 767 200 design increas passeng cargo capabl flight 6,600 mile sai first deliveri schedul februari 1988 jet will seat 215 tri class configur boe sai now order 47 767 300 new york airbu industri sai amr also launch custom a300 600r widebodi amr todai announc order 15 boe 25 airbu twinjet airbu sai amr configur a300 600r will seat 16 first class 251 economi deliveri will make bewtween april 1988 june 1989 airbu disclos valu order boe sai amr will oper 767 north atlant rout airbu sai amr will oper a300 caribbean rout
